actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-100 to eliminate the prohibition on depository institutions situated in New York and New Jersey from offering negotiable order of withdrawal accounts.

summary.text: Exempts depository institutions situated in New York and New Jersey from the prohibition against offering interest on dividend-paying accounts, from which the owner may make withdrawals by negotiable or transferable instruments for the purpose of making transfers to third parties.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-100 to eliminate the prohibition on depository institutions situated in New York and New Jersey from offering negotiable order of withdrawal accounts.
